channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins PegDown Formatter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins PegDown Formatter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10374|2024-08-04T22:17:20.368Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pegdown%20formatter%20plugin
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in Jenkins PegDown Formatter Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers able to edit descriptions and other fields rendered using the configured markup formatter to insert links with the javascript scheme into the Jenkins UI.
